If I could just put in my two cents,

Transformers had 2 Megatrons: the G1/G2 versions and the BW/BM version.
They are in no relation to one another.

There were three Silverbolts: one was an Aerialbot, the other was the Fuzor
from BW/BM and the third... I think it was a wolf but I'm not sure on that.

The G1 Inferno was an Autobot fire truck, the BW Inferno was an evil
Predacon fire ant.

All I'm saying is that it is possible for two characters to have the same
name and be completely different.

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> There have been two toys with the name Prowl, Alloran2. One of them is an
> owl, and the other is a lion that is part of Magnaboss. This Prowl is the
> owl, but he has a fairly strange history, probably different from the
toy's,
> and I'd doupt he and Bluestreak could possible be brothers, but IM me if
you
> have any comments.
>
> ::Prowl/Striker::
>
> Prowl looks at Iron Raptor, as she places her hand on his arm. "Actually I
> have no idea what I'm doing. You're third in command, I was hoping you'd
take
> over from here," he says, feeling slightly stupid. He turns to Rhinox, not
> hearing the sleepy murmurings from Cyber Claw.
>
> "I have read about you in data logs back on Cybertron. There are plenty of
us
> here, but they havn't got here yet."
>
> At that point, Striker walks into the room, nearly crashing into Cyber
Claw
> in the proccess. He looks at her, surprised. "Welcome, I don't believe we
> met."
>
